text: Describe an algorithm for multiplying positive and negative rational numbers. How can you predict whether the product of two rational numbers is a positive number, negative number, or zero?

Possible algorithm: Multiply the absolute values of all of the factors to find the product, and then consider whether the product is positive or negative. When there is an odd number of negative factors, then your result will be negative. When there is an even number of negative factors, then your result is even. If any of the factors are 0 (which is neither positive nor negative), then your result will be 0.
